text: Cho Kuk (; born 6 April 1965) is a South Korean politician. He was a member of the National Assembly of South Korea from May to December 2024. He lost his seat following the Supreme Court of Korea's decision to uphold his two-year prison sentence. He is the founder of the Rebuilding Korea Party. Cho was a senior presidential aide for civil affairs under the cabinet of President Moon Jae-in from May 2017 to July 2019. He was the Minister of Justice from September 2019 until his resignation on 14 October 2019. Cho was briefly a candidate for President of South Korea in the 2025 snap presidential election. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean criminals Category:South Korean politicians Category:South Korean activists Category:South Korean lawyers
title: Cho Kuk
